TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXmlTextParser

Docs.summary: Establishes a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A> property for use by the .NET Framework infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You should not implement the IXmlTextParser interface in your code. Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether white space and attribute values are normalized.
Docs.value: if white space attributes values are normalized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and Normalized property in your code. Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.

Docs.returns: if white space attributes values are normalized; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets how white space is handled when parsing XML.
Docs.value: A member of the enumeration that describes how whites pace is handled when parsing XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A> property in your code. Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.

Docs.returns: A member of the enumeration that describes how whites pace is handled when parsing XML.
